block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$1.05 million 126 West 22nd Street (Chelsea Flats) 2,200-sq.-ft. open-space condo in a renovated prewar loft building; granite and stainless-steel kitchen, 2 renovated baths, high ceilings, decorative columns, oversized windows, c/a; common charges $757; taxes $13,716; listed at $1.1 million, 13 weeks on market (Brokers: Corcoran Group; Eychner Associates)

$975,000 135 East 54th Street 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,700-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, elevator attendants, dining room, renovated kitchen and bath, 2 exposures; common charges $971; taxes $7,464; listed at $975,000, 14 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$375,000 30 East Ninth Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 900-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, renovated kitchen and bath, 2 exposures; maintenance $876, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $389,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

$736,000 145 West 86th Street (Summit) 2-bedroom, 2-bath co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, high ceilings, original moldings and detail; maintenance $1,100, 43% tax-deductible; listed at $725,000 (multiple bids), 7 weeks on market (Brokers: Douglas Elliman; Halstead Property Co.)

$1.375 million 301 West 57th Street (Central Park Place) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,455-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, bay window, washer/dryer, Central Park view, health club in building; common charges $950; taxes $14,743; listed at $1.4 million, 1 week on market (Brokers: Bette Bregman; Redac)

$65,000 2191 Bolton Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; h/w floors, dining area, 2 exposures; maintenance $570, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $65,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Sandra Silverman)

$280,000 457 West 256th Street 3-bedroom, 1 full- and 2 half-bath, 37-year-old semiattached brick town house; dining room, family room, 1-car garage, 28-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,368; listed at $325,000, 17 weeks on market (Broker: Trebach)

$180,000 66 Fourth Place 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; exposed brick walls, fireplace; maintenance $406, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $189,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Brooklyn Bridge Real Estate)

$283,000 270 Fifth Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a renovated former factory building; elevator, high ceilings, h/w floors, private deck; maintenance $771, 47% tax-deductible; listed at $299,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$309,000 708 Eighth Avenue 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; dining room, renovated kitchen, fireplace, private roof deck; maintenance $525, 60% tax-deductible; listed at $309,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

$202,000 203-11 34th Avenue 3-bedroom 1-bath, 70-year-old aluminum-sided colonial; dining room, renovated kitchen, den, skylight, new windows, 18-by-94-ft. lot; taxes $1,100; listed at $219,000, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: ReMax/Millennium; ERA/United)

$390,000 100-44 75th Avenue 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 75-year-old frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, 1-car garage, 40-by-85-ft. lot; taxes $2,416; listed at $410,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/F. H. Real Estate)

$237,000 428 Armstrong Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 40-year-old wood-frame and brick high ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, c/a, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,288; listed at $249,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Salmon)

$307,500 50 Dogwood Lane 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 30-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room with fireplace, 2-car garage, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $5,700; listed at $329,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: Anastasio)

$660,000 18 Deepwells Lane 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath new colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, basement, fireplace, 3-car attached garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $15,000; listed at $699,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker Sammis)

$1.45 million 261 Harbor Road 5-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 16-year-old contemporary; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, 3 fireplaces, 5-car garage, attached 18th-century servants' wing; 1.48-acre lot with water view; taxes $29,500; listed at $1.675 million, 24 weeks on market (Brokers: Sandsport; Point to Port)

$310,000 76 Orchard Street 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 90-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, full attic and basement, 1-car garage, needs work, 0.48-acre lot; taxes $2,772; listed at $350,000, 39 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/ Greenwich; William Pitt)

$170,000 92 Lafayette Street (Lafayette Court) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,700-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; dining area, cathedral ceilings, home office, marble whirlpool bath off master suite; common charges $130; taxes $2,955; listed at $179,000, 13 weeks on market (Brokers: Shays Real Estate; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

$368,500 25 Spruce Hill Road 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 46-year-old ranch; dining room, family room, sun room, fireplace, screened porch, rear deck, 2-car garage, 2.1-acre lot; taxes $4,830; listed at $384,000, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt Real Estate; ReMax Heritage)

$339,535 371 Ambiance Boulevard 5-bedroom, 3-bath newly constructed colonial; c/a, eat-in kitchen, basement, fireplace, 2-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes to be assessed; listed at $320,490 (options added), 2 days on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

$150,000 500 Bay Avenue 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 12-year-old furnished condo; c/a, 2 parking spaces, water views, pool; common charges $320; taxes $2,028; listed at $139,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (Broker: Richards Agency)

$327,900 570 Shelton Road 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 60-year-old colonial; fireplace, basement, 1-car garage, 50-by-103-ft. lot; taxes $6,325; listed at $329,900, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens; Weichert)

$99,000 1019 Boulevard 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 14-year-old condominium; cathedral ceilings, ocean view, eat-in kitchen, deck, common charges $70, taxes $1,589; listed at $103,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert)

$303,500 176 Lakeview Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 53-year-old Cape Cod; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, patio, 1-car garage; 50-by-100-foot lot; taxes $5,673; listed at $329,000, 11 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; Steckler)

$351,000 46 Westwood Circle 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 15-year-old town house; fireplace, clubhouse, exercise room, pool; taxes $8,571; listed at $340,000 (multiple bids), 10 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; Redac)

$735,000 249 Upper Shad Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 17-year-old colonial; 2-story entry hall, 2 fireplaces, dining room; 3-acre lot; taxes $11,750; listed at $699,000 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Buyer's Edge; Preferred)

$335,000 1303 Dorset Drive 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 5-year-old semiattached town house; entry foyer, dining room, fireplace, deck, eat-in kitchen, cathedral ceilings, 2-car garage; 0.44-acre lot; taxes $5,953; listed at $335,000, 18 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
